Get yourself a piece of that.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Forgive me, but you are doing yourself a disservice. I have known many people in this world but made few friends, and I can safely say ...

name: JOHN
line: I cheated on her.

name: JOHN
line: No clever comeback?

name: JOHN
line: I cheated on you, Mary.

name: JOHN
line: There was a woman on the bus, and I had a plastic daisy in my hair. I’d been playing with Rosie. (He pauses for a moment then raises his eyes.) And this girl just smiled at me.

name: JOHN
line: That’s all it was; it was a smile.

name: JOHN
line: That’s all it was, just texting.

name: JOHN
line: But I wanted more.

name: JOHN
line: And d’you know something? I still do. I’m not the man you thought I was; I’m not that guy. I never could be. But that’s the point. (He sniffs, then looks at her as his eyes fill with more tears. He bites his lip and speaks tearfully.) That’s the whole point.

name: JOHN
line: Who you thought I was ... (she nods at him) ... is the man who I want to be.

name: MARY
line: Get the hell on with it.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Oh, well. Suppose a sugar high’s some sort of substitute.

name: JOHN
line: Behave.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Right then. You know ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: ... it’s not my place to say but ... it was just texting.

name: SHERLOCK
line: People text.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Even I text. Her, I mean. Woman. Bad idea; try not to, but, you know, sometimes.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s not a pleasant thought, John, but I have this terrible feeling, from time to time, that we might all just be human.

name: JOHN
line: Even you?

name: SHERLOCK
line: No.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Even you.

name: JOHN
line: Cake?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Oh, um ...

name: JOHN
line: What? What is it?

name: JOHN
line: What’s wrong?

name: JOHN
line: Seriously?!

name: SHERLOCK
line: I’m Sherlock Holmes. I wear the damn hat.

name: inserted here so as not to interrupt later scenes
line: a person’s name will be given during a later conversation. It’s an unusual name and there has been much discussion online about how it is spelled, because historically there are two variants. I have chosen to go with the version that seems most likely to be correct, even though it’s pronounced slightly differently, but this spelling was used in the BBC subtitles and was therefore probably given to the subtitler by the producers. If the next episode or the writers/producers specifically clarify that they choose to spell it the other way, I’ll correct the transcript.]

name: THERAPIST
line: It is what it is?

name: JOHN
line: Yeah.

name: THERAPIST
line: And Rosie?

name: JOHN
line: Oh, beautiful, perfect, unprecedented in the history of children. (He smiles.) That’s not my bias; that’s scientific fact. (He nods.)

name: THERAPIST
line: Good.

name: THERAPIST
line: And Sherlock Holmes?

name: JOHN
line: Back to normal.

name: MALE CLIENT
line: She’s possessed by the Devil!

name: MALE CLIENT
line: I swear my wife is channeling Satan!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Why not, given your immediate alternative?

name: JOHN
line: Mycroft? He’s fine.

name: MYCROFT
line: So, you’re off now?

name: MYCROFT
line: I won’t see you for a week?

name: MYCROFT
line: The P.M.

name: LADY SMALLWOOD
line: My number.

name: MYCROFT
line: I already have your number.

name: LADY SMALLWOOD
line: My private number.

name: MYCROFT
line: Why would I need that?

name: LADY SMALLWOOD
line: Up to you. (She smiles at him.) Call me.

name: SHERLOCK
line: She was real.

name: THERAPIST
line: I meant the other one.

name: JOHN
line: Wh-which other one?

name: THERAPIST
line: You know – the secret one.

name: JOHN
line: Oh, that was just something I ... (he smiles and takes a breath) ... I said. I’m sure there’s ...

name: JOHN
line: How did you know about that? I didn’t tell you that.

name: THERAPIST
line: You must have done.

name: JOHN
line: I really didn’t.

name: THERAPIST
line: Well, maybe Sherlock told me.

name: THERAPIST
line: Oh, no, no. I-I-I met him before that.

name: JOHN
line: When?

name: THERAPIST
line: It was lovely. We had chips.

name: THERAPIST
line: Culverton gave me Faith’s original note. (She stands up.) A mutual friend put us in touch.

name: THERAPIST
line: Did Sherlock ever tell you about the note?

name: THERAPIST
line: I added some deductions for Sherlock. (She puts the door key onto the side table, then drops her glasses onto the table.) He was ... quite good.

name: THERAPIST
line: ... he didn’t get the big one.

name: THERAPIST
line: In fairness, though, he does have excellent taste in chips.

name: JOHN
line: What’s that?

name: THERAPIST
line: What’s what?

name: JOHN
line: The flower in your hair: it’s like I had on the bus.

name: THERAPIST
line: ... you have such nice eyes.

name: THERAPIST
line: Oh, please don’t go anywhere. I’m sure the therapist who actually lives here wouldn’t want blood on the carpet.

name: THERAPIST
line: Oh, hang on, it’s fine. She’s in a sack in the airing cupboard.

name: JOHN
line: Who are you?

name: EURUS
line: Silly name, isn’t it? Greek. Means the East Wind.

name: EURUS
line: My parents loved silly names, like Eurus ... or Mycroft ... or Sherlock.

name: EURUS
line: Oh, look at him. Didn’t it ever occur to you – not even once – that Sherlock’s secret brother might just be Sherlock’s secret sister?

name: EURUS
line: Huh. He’s making a funny face.

name: EURUS
line: I think I’ll put a hole in it.

name: GIRL
line: Mummy?

name: GIRL
line: Mummy! Wake up! Wake up! Mummy!

name: GIRL
line: Wake up!

name: VOICE
line: Hello. My name’s Jim Moriarty. Welcome ... to the final problem.

name: LEONARD
line: You know I could arrest you?

name: VELMA
line: What for?

name: LEONARD
line: Wearing a dress like that.

name: VELMA
line: Would you like me to take it off?

name: LEONARD
line: Then I’d really have to press charges.

name: VELMA
line: Press away.

name: VELMA
line: Now, what was all that about arresting me?

name: VELMA
line: Very close?

name: LEONARD
line: You were?

name: VELMA
line: Fingerprinting ...

name: VELMA
line: ... thoroughly.

name: VOICE
line: Mycroft.

name: VOICE
line: Mycroft.

name: MYCROFT
line: Why don’t you come out and show yourself? I don’t have time for this.

name: s VOICE
line: We have time, brother dear. All the time in the world.

name: MYCROFT
line: Who are you?

name: MYCROFT
line: Impossible.

name: s VOICE
line: You of all people know that.

name: s VOICE
line: There’s no defence ... (the voice becomes more of a whisper) ... and nowhere to hide.

name: MYCROFT
line: Sherlock? Help me!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Experiment complete. Conclusion: I have a sister.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Conclusion two: my sister – Eurus, apparently – has been incarcerated from an early age in a secure institution controlled by my brother.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Hey, bro!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Conclusion three: you are terrified of her!

name: New information
line: she’s out.

name: MYCROFT
line: That’s not possible.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s more than possible. She was John’s therapist.

name: JOHN
line: Shot me during a session.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Only with a tranquilliser.

name: JOHN
line: Mm. We still had ten minutes to go.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Well, we’ll see about a refund.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Right, you two. Wiggins has got your money by the gate.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Don’t spend it all in one crack den.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Oh, I hope we didn’t spoil your enjoyment of the movie.

name: MYCROFT
line: You’re just leaving?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Well, we’re not staying here. Eurus is coming and, uh, someone’s disabled all your security.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Sleep well!

name: MYCROFT
line: Doctor Watson. Why would he do that to me? That was insane!

name: JOHN
line: Uh, yes. Well, someone convinced him that you wouldn’t tell the truth unless you were actually wetting yourself.

name: MYCROFT
line: “Someone”?

name: JOHN
line: Probably me.

name: MYCROFT
line: So that’s it, is it? You’re just going?

name: JOHN
line: Two two one B Baker Street.

name: JOHN
line: You might wanna close that window. (He looks at Mycroft.) There is an East Wind coming.

name: MRS HUDSON
line: You have to sit in the chair.

name: MRS HUDSON
line: They won’t talk to you unless you sit in the chair. It’s the rules.

name: MYCROFT
line: She’s not going to stay there, is she?

name: MYCROFT
line: Thank you.

name: SHERLOCK
line: You’re going to tell the truth, Mycroft, pure and simple.

name: MYCROFT
line: Who was it said, “Truth is rarely pure, and never simple”?

name: SHERLOCK
line: A sister I can’t remember. Interesting name, Eurus. It’s Greek, isn’t it?

name: MYCROFT
line: Yes.

name: MYCROFT
line: No.

name: SHERLOCK
line: You turned my sister into a ghost story.

name: MYCROFT
line: Of course I didn’t. I monitored you.

name: JOHN
line: You what?

name: MYCROFT
line: This is a private matter.

name: SHERLOCK
line: John stays.

name: JOHN
line: So there were three Holmes kids.

name: JOHN
line: What was the age gap?

name: MYCROFT
line: Seven years between myself and Sherlock; one year between Sherlock and Eurus.

name: JOHN
line: Middle child. Explains a lot.

name: MYCROFT
line: Have what?

name: JOHN
line: The deduction thing.

name: JOHN
line: Enlighten me.

name: SHERLOCK
line: As you never cease to announce.

name: MYCROFT
line: ... but Eurus, she was incandescent even then. Our abilities were professionally assessed more than once. I was remarkable, but Eurus was described as an era-defining genius, beyond Newton.

name: MYCROFT
line: You do remember her, in a way. Every choice you ever made; every path you’ve ever taken – the man you are today ... is your memory of Eurus.

name: MYCROFT
line: She was different from the beginning.

name: MYCROFT
line: She knew things she should never have known ...

name: EURUS
line: You look funny grown up.

name: JOHN
line: What’s wrong?

name: MYCROFT
line: Sorry.

name: MYCROFT
line: The memories are disturbing.

name: SHERLOCK
line: What do you mean? Examples.

name: MYCROFT
line: They found her with a knife once. She seemed to be cutting herself. Mother and Father were terrified. They thought it was a suicide attempt. But when I asked Eurus what she was doing, she said ...

name: EURUS
line: I wanted to see how my muscles worked.

name: MYCROFT
line: So I asked her if she felt pain, and she said ...

name: EURUS
line: Which one’s pain?

name: MYCROFT
line: Musgrave.

name: MYCROFT
line: The ancestral home, where there was always honey for tea.

name: MYCROFT
line: ... and Sherlock played among the funny gravestones.

name: Carved into the stone are the words
s VOICE
line: ♪ ... who will find me / Deep down below the old beech tree? ♪

name: SHERLOCK
line: Sixteen by six ...

name: MYCROFT
line: You’re starting to remember.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Fragments.

name: YOUNG SHERLOCK
line: Redbeard!

name: YOUNG SHERLOCK
line: Redbeard!

name: JOHN
line: Redbeard?

name: ADULT SHERLOCK
line: He was my dog.

name: We see his pirate hat in close detail for the first time
line: it’s a very deep blue, almost the same colour as the Coat he will wear in the future, and it has dark red bands sewn down it.)

name: MYCROFT
line: ... and she refused to say where he was.

name: MYCROFT
line: She’d only repeat that song; her little ritual.

name: YOUNG SHERLOCK
line: Redbeard!

name: MYCROFT
line: We begged and begged her to tell us where he was.

name: MYCROFT
line: ... but she said ...

name: MYCROFT
line: But the song made no sense.

name: EURUS
line: ♪ ... brother, and under we go. ♪

name: MYCROFT
line: We never found him. But she started calling him “Drowned Redbeard,” so we made our assumptions. (To John) Sherlock was traumatised. Natural, I suppose – he was, in the early days, an emotional child; but after that he was different, so changed. Never spoke of it again. In time, he seemed to forget that Eurus had ever even existed.

name: JOHN
line: How could he forget? She was living in the same house.

name: JOHN
line: Why? You don’t lock up a child because a dog goes missing.

name: MYCROFT
line: Quite so. It was what happened immediately afterwards.

name: MYCROFT
line: After that, our sister had to be taken away.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Where?

name: MYCROFT
line: Oh, some suitable place – or so everyone thought. Not suitable enough, however. She died there.

name: JOHN
line: How?

name: MYCROFT
line: She started another fire, one which she did not survive.

name: MYCROFT
line: Yes. It is also a kindness. This is the story I told our parents to spare them further pain, and to account for the absence of an identifiable body.

name: SHERLOCK
line: And no doubt to prevent their further interference.

name: MYCROFT
line: Well, that too, of course. The depth of Eurus’ psychosis and the extent of her abilities couldn’t hope to be contained in any ordinary institution. Uncle Rudy took care of things.

name: MYCROFT
line: There’s a place called Sherrinford; an island. It’s a secure and very secretive installation whose sole purpose is to contain what we call ‘the uncontainables.’

name: MYCROFT
line: The demons beneath the road – this is where we trap them. Sherrinford is more than a prison or an asylum; it is a fortress built to keep the rest of the world safe from what is inside it.

name: MYCROFT
line: Heaven may be a fantasy for the credulous and the afraid, but I can give you a map reference for Hell.

name: MYCROFT
line: That’s where our sister has been since early childhood. She hasn’t left – not for a single day.

name: MYCROFT
line: Whoever you both met, it can’t have been her.

name: VOICE
line: ♪ I that am lost / Oh, who will find me / Deep down below / The old beech tree? ♪

name: VOICE
line: ♪ Help succour me now / The East Wind’s blowing / Sixteen by six, brother / And under we go. ♪

name: MYCROFT
line: Keep back! Keep as still as you can!

name: VOICE
line: ♪ My soul seeks / The shade of my willow’s bloom ... ♪

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s a drone.

name: JOHN
line: Yeah, I can see that.

name: JOHN
line: What’s it carrying?

name: MYCROFT
line: I’ve authorised the purchase of quite a number of these.

name: MYCROFT
line: Colloquially it is known as “the patience grenade.”

name: JOHN
line: “Patience”?

name: MYCROFT
line: The motion sensor has activated. If any of us move, the grenade will detonate.

name: SHERLOCK
line: How powerful?

name: MYCROFT
line: It will certainly destroy this flat and kill anyone in it. Assuming walls of reasonable strength, your neighbours should be safe, but as it’s landed on the floor, I am moved to wonder if the café below is open.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s Sunday morning, so it’s closed.

name: JOHN
line: What about Mrs Hudson?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Going by her usual routine, I estimate she has another two minutes left.

name: JOHN
line: She keeps the vacuum cleaner at the back of the flat.

name: MYCROFT
line: So?

name: JOHN
line: So, safer there when she’s putting it away?

name: JOHN
line: Look, we have to move eventually. We should do it when she’s safest.

name: SHERLOCK
line: When the vacuum stops, we give her eight seconds to get to the back of the flat. She’s fast when she’s cleaning. Then we move.

name: SHERLOCK
line: What’s the trigger response time?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Once we’re mobile, how long before detonation?

name: MYCROFT
line: We have a maximum of three seconds to vacate the blast radius.

name: SHERLOCK
line: John and I will take the windows; you take the stairs. Help get Mrs Hudson out too.

name: MYCROFT
line: Me?

name: SHERLOCK
line: You’re closer.

name: MYCROFT
line: You’re faster.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Speed differential won’t be as critical as the distance.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I estimate we have a minute left. Is a phone call possible?

name: MYCROFT
line: Phone call?

name: SHERLOCK
line: John has a daughter. (He glances towards him without moving his head.) He may wish to say goodbye.

name: MYCROFT
line: I’m sorry, Doctor Watson. Any movement will set off the grenade.

name: MYCROFT
line: I hope you understand.

name: JOHN
line: Oscar Wilde.

name: MYCROFT
line: What?

name: JOHN
line: He said, “The truth is rarely pure, and never simple.” It’s from ‘The Importance of Being Earnest.’ We did it in school.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yeah. You were great.

name: MYCROFT
line: You really think so?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yes, I really do.

name: MYCROFT
line: Well, that’s good to know. I’ve always wondered.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Good luck, boys.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Three, two, one, go!

name: RADIO
line: And now the shipping forecast, issued by the Met Office on behalf of the Maritime Coastguard Agency at 05:05. Thames, Dover ...

name: VINCE
line: Go on, son, get it up. (He smiles cheerfully at him.) Better out than in.

name: BEN
line: Is it always like this?

name: VINCE
line: Nah.

name: BEN
line: Thank God.

name: VINCE
line: Usually it’s much worse!

name: BEN
line: Is that an ’elicopter?

name: VINCE
line: Nah, not in this weather.

name: RADIO
line: ... Lundy, Fastnet, Irish Sea, Shannon, Malin, Sherrinford. Sherrinford. Sherrinford.

name: BEN
line: You hear that?

name: RADIO
line: Sherrinford.

name: BEN
line: I never ’eard that one before.

name: BEN
line: Sherrinford?

name: BEN
line: What?

name: VINCE
line: Sometimes when we’re out in these waters, we get that message. Just forget about it.

name: BEN
line: Yeah, but we’ve never ...

name: VINCE
line: Just ...

name: VINCE
line: Who the ’ell are you?

name: SHERLOCK
line: My name’s Sherlock Holmes.

name: BEN
line: The detective!

name: SHERLOCK
line: The pirate.

name: TECHNICIAN
line: Golf Whiskey X-ray, this is a restricted area, repeat, restricted area. You are off course.

name: TECHNICIAN
line: Golf Whiskey X-ray, you are off course. Are you receiving?

name: s VOICE
line: Yeah, receiving you. This is a distress call, repeat, distress call. We’re in trouble here.

name: TECHNICIAN
line: Golf Whiskey X-ray, what is your situation?

name: TECHNICIAN
line: Golf Whiskey X-ray? Where are you now?

name: TECHNICIAN
line: Governor to the Control Room.

name: AUTOMATED VOICE
line: Lockdown in progress. Lockdown in progress.

name: AUTOMATED VOICE
line: Please proceed to designated Red stations. Please proceed to designated Red stations.

name: BEN
line: No, hold it! Wait, wait, wait, wait!

name: GUARD
line: Oi! In the sand!

name: GUARD
line: In the sand!

name: SIR EDWIN
line: He’s not conscious. He’s severely injured. No-one is even confident he’s going to pull through.

name: SIR EDWIN
line: Missing.

name: GOVERNOR
line: No, he’s not. He’s here.

name: TECHNICIAN
line: Sir, we found two more from the boat.

name: FISHERMAN
line: He stole our boat! Him an’ another fella, with guns!

name: GOVERNOR
line: Where’d you find them?

name: GOVERNOR
line: Holding cell, now.

name: IRISH GUARD
line: Right, sir.

name: AUTOMATED VOICE
line: Lockdown in progress.

name: FISHERMAN
line: This is a mistake. I’m the victim ’ere. (He stands up and jerks a finger down to John.) This man stole my boat. ’e’s a pirate.

name: JOHN
line: Yeah, I really am.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Please, sit down.

name: GOVERNOR
line: He’s Doctor John Watson, formerly of the Fifth Northumberland Fusiliers. (He looks down at him.) What are you doing here?

name: JOHN
line: It’s a hospital. Any work?

name: GOVERNOR
line: It’s not a hospital.

name: GOVERNOR
line: I want eyes on Eurus Holmes. Go straight to the Special Unit, deploy Green and Yellow Shift on my authority.

name: GOVERNOR
line: I’m sparing your blushes because we’re supposed to be on the same side; and frankly, this is embarrassing.

name: GOVERNOR
line: The true art of disguise, according to your famous friend, is not being looked at.

name: GOVERNOR
line: But I am looking at you, aren’t I, Mr Holmes?

name: JOHN
line: But that is sort of the point ... (he looks across to the man beside him) ... isn’t it?

name: JOHN
line: See, you should have been looking at the guy you just gave your pass to.

name: MYCROFT
line: That’s the trouble with uniforms and name badges. People stop looking at faces. You’d be better off with clown outfits. (He turns around.) At least they’d be satirically relevant.

name: JOHN
line: Oh, you’ll find the real Landers on the north shore, tied up with two others.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Two others?

name: JOHN
line: Mm. Well, it was trial and error. (He gestures to his own waist as he speaks.) We had to find the right waistband.

name: GOVERNOR
line: This is insane! This is unnecessary!

name: JOHN
line: No; your security is compromised and we don’t know who to trust.

name: GOVERNOR
line: And that justifies dressing up?

name: listen to me
line: for your own physical safety do not speak, do not indulge in any non-verbal signals suggestive of internal thought. If the safety of my sister is compromised; if the security of my sister is compromised; if the incarceration of my sister is compromised – in short, if I find any indication my sister has left this island at any time, I swear to you, you will not.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Why?

name: MYCROFT
line: He talked me out of Lady Bracknell. This could have been very different.

name: MYCROFT
line: Are you in?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Just arriving at the Secure Unit. Explain.

name: AUTOMATED VOICE
line: Door opening.

name: MYCROFT
line: Since you’re determined to meet her, you’re about to find out.

name: MYCROFT
line: Answer yes or no. Has there ever been – against my express instructions – any attempt at a psychiatric evaluation of Eurus Holmes?

name: GOVERNOR
line: Yes.

name: MYCROFT
line: I presume the tapes are in my office?

name: GOVERNOR
line: Your office?

name: GUARD
line: You ’aven’t been down ’ere before, ’ave you? “Silence of the Lambs,” basically.

name: GUARD
line: Keep your distance; stay at least three feet away from the glass an’ all that.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Why the headphones?

name: GUARD
line: She doesn’t stop playin’, sometimes for weeks.

name: GUARD
line: Kills you in the end.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Aye. Still beautiful, though.

name: AUTOMATED VOICE
line: Door closing.

name: s note
line: I’m told by several people that the accent which Sherlock used is Scottish, not northern Irish.  Even after listening to a video explaining the tendencies of Irish accents, I still hear Irish, so I’m leaving it here but bear in mind I could well be wrong.]

name: EURUS
line: Why am I here?

name: EURUS
line: No-one ever tells me.

name: EURUS
line: Am I being punished?

name: EURUS
line: Good and bad are fairytales. We have evolved to attach an emotional significance to what is nothing more than the survival strategy of the pack animal. We are conditioned to invest divinity in utility. Good isn’t really good, evil isn’t really wrong, and bottoms aren’t really pretty. You are a prisoner of your own meat.

name: EURUS
line: Did you bring it?

name: SHERLOCK
line: I’m sorry?

name: EURUS
line: My hairband. Did you bring it like I asked?

name: EURUS
line: My special hairband.

name: EURUS
line: It was the last thing I said to you, remember, the day they took me away.

name: EURUS
line: No?

name: SHERLOCK
line: No, we’ve spoken since then. You came round to my flat a few weeks back; you pretended to be a woman called Faith Smith. We had chips.

name: EURUS
line: Does this mean you didn’t bring my hairband?

name: SHERLOCK
line: How did you manage to get out of this place? How did you do that?

name: EURUS
line: Easy. Look at me.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I am looking at you.

name: EURUS
line: You can’t see it, can you? You try and try but you just can’t see; you can’t look.

name: SHERLOCK
line: See what?

name: EURUS
line: What do you think?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Beautiful.

name: EURUS
line: You’re not looking at it.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I meant your playing.

name: EURUS
line: Oh, the music. (She lowers the violin and turns it round to look at the front.) I never know if it’s beautiful or not; only if it’s right.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Often they’re the same thing.

name: EURUS
line: Look at the violin.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I need to know how you escaped.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s a Stradivarius.

name: EURUS
line: It’s a gift.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Who from?

name: EURUS
line: Me.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Why?

name: SHERLOCK
line: How did you know?

name: EURUS
line: How did I know? I taught you, don’t you remember? How can you not remember that?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Eurus, I don’t remember you at all.

name: SHERLOCK
line: What do you mean, “rewritten”?

name: EURUS
line: You still don’t know about Redbeard, do you?

name: EURUS
line: Oh. This is going to be such a good day.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Everyone we sent in there; it-it’s hard to describe.

name: GOVERNOR
line: It’s ... it’s like she ...

name: MYCROFT
line: ... recruited them.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Enslaved them.

name: MYCROFT
line: She’s been capable of that since she was five.

name: MYCROFT
line: She’s an adult now. I warned you; I ordered you.

name: GOVERNOR
line: She’s clinically unique. We had to try.

name: MYCROFT
line: At what cost?

name: MYCROFT
line: Tell me the worst thing that has happened.

name: MYCROFT
line: And?

name: GOVERNOR
line: He said it was like an earworm; couldn’t get her out of his head.

name: MYCROFT
line: And?

name: GOVERNOR
line: He left.

name: MYCROFT
line: And?

name: GOVERNOR
line: Killed himself.

name: GOVERNOR
line: ... his family.

name: EURUS
line: It’s okay if you cry.

name: EURUS
line: I can help you cry.

name: EURUS
line: Play for me.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I need to know how you got out of here.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Me?

name: EURUS
line: You.

name: EURUS
line: Oh! Have you had sex?

name: EURUS
line: The music. I’ve had sex.

name: SHERLOCK
line: How?

name: EURUS
line: One of the nurses got careless. I liked it. Messy, though. People are so breakable.

name: EURUS
line: He?

name: SHERLOCK
line: She?

name: EURUS
line: Afraid I didn’t notice in the heat of the moment and afterwards ... well, you couldn’t really tell. Is that vibrato or is your hand shaking?

name: I warned you explicitly
line: no-one was to talk to her alone.

name: GOVERNOR
line: You spoke to her.

name: GOVERNOR
line: You even brought her a visitor on Christmas Day.

name: GOVERNOR
line: You gave her a Christmas present. Remember her Christmas present?

name: JOHN
line: What dangers?

name: MYCROFT
line: Anyone who spends time with her is automatically compromised.

name: EURUS
line: Helping someone ... (she nods) ... is the best way you can help yourself.

name: SHERLOCK
line: So clearly you remember me.

name: s VOICE
line: Vatican Cameos.

name: SHERLOCK
line: In a minute.

name: EURUS
line: Let’s continue.

name: EURUS
line: Did they tell you to keep three feet from the glass?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yes.

name: EURUS
line: Be naughty. Step closer.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Why?

name: EURUS
line: Do it. Step closer.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Tell me what you remember.

name: EURUS
line: You, me, and Mycroft. (She sighs a little.) Mycroft was quite clever. He could understand things if you went a bit slow but you ... you were my favourite.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Why was I your favourite?

name: EURUS
line: ’Cause I could make you laugh. I loved it when you laughed. Once I made you laugh all night. I thought you were going to burst.

name: EURUS
line: I was so happy.

name: EURUS
line: Then Mummy and Daddy had to stop me, of course.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Why?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Why was I screaming?

name: SHERLOCK
line: I remember Redbeard.

name: EURUS
line: Touch the glass.

name: MYCROFT
line: I put my trust in you, my implicit trust.

name: MYCROFT
line: As governor of this institute ...

name: GOVERNOR
line: It’s obvious when it all started. Well, she was never the same after that Christmas. It’s as if you woke her up.

name: MYCROFT
line: That is entirely beside the point! You had your orders and failed to act on them.

name: MYCROFT
line: Sorry?

name: JOHN
line: Do it now. Listen.

name: MYCROFT
line: My sister’s methods of ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: Redbeard was my dog. I know what happened to Redbeard.

name: EURUS
line: I’ll touch it too, if you’re scared.

name: EURUS
line: I can fix her for you, and then I’ll give you her straight back, good as new.

name: EURUS
line: I promise.

name: JOHN
line: Everyone who went in there got affected – “enslaved,” you said.

name: JOHN
line: One after the other.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Yes.

name: JOHN
line: If Eurus has enslaved you, then who exactly is in charge of this prison?

name: JOHN
line: No.

name: JOHN
line: No.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s more common than you’d think.

name: EURUS
line: Do you see how it was done? I know you like explanations.

name: EURUS
line: And my voice? Throat mic. Puts me through the speakers.

name: EURUS
line: Don’t you think it’s clever? Simple but clever?

name: EURUS
line: Well, you do keep asking me how I got out of here.

name: EURUS
line: Get in here, all of you! Stop me killing him!

name: EURUS
line: No, no. Stop me in a minute.

name: VOICE
line: Red alert! Red alert! Big bad bouncy red alert!

name: JIM
line: Miss me? Miss me? Miss me? Miss me? Miss me? Miss me?

name: GOVERNOR
line: Mr Moriarty.

name: JIM
line: Big G.

name: JIM
line: “Big G.” Means “governor.” Street speak. I’m a bit down with the kids, you know? I’m relatable that way. D’you like my boys?

name: JIM
line: This one’s got more stamina, but he’s less caring in the afterglow.

name: GOVERNOR
line: This way, please.

name: JIM
line: Smell all that insane criminality.

name: JIM
line: Do you have cannibals here?

name: GOVERNOR
line: Yes.

name: JIM
line: How many?

name: GOVERNOR
line: Three.

name: MYCROFT
line: Won’t you sit down?

name: MYCROFT
line: You know what this place is, of course?

name: MYCROFT
line: You remain a person of interest, but until you commit a verifiable crime you are – I regret – at liberty.

name: JIM
line: Then why am I here?

name: MYCROFT
line: You’re a Christmas present.

name: JIM
line: Ah. (He walks across the room to Mycroft’s side of the table and holds out his arms as he walks past him.) How’d you want me?

name: MYCROFT
line: She predicted the exact dates of the last three terrorist attacks on the British mainland after an hour on Twitter. That sort of thing. In return, however, she requires treats. Last year it was a violin.

name: JIM
line: This year?

name: MYCROFT
line: Five minutes’ unsupervised conversation ... with you.

name: JIM
line: Me?! (Smiling, he turns towards Mycroft and blinks mock-bashfully before lifting one hand to his chest, pretending to look amazed.) With me?!

name: MYCROFT
line: She has noted your interest in the activities of my little brother.

name: JIM
line: Whatever you’re about to tell me ...

name: JIM
line: ... awesome!

name: JIM
line: I’m your Christmas present.

name: SHERLOCK
line: How are you?

name: JOHN
line: Bit of a lump.

name: SHERLOCK
line: True dat, but you have your uses.

name: JOHN
line: Did you see your sister?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yes.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Family’s always difficult.

name: JOHN
line: Are we phoning someone?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Apparently.

name: JOHN
line: What’s he doing here?

name: SHERLOCK
line: As he is told. (He stops and turns to John.) Eurus is in control.

name: GIRL
line: Help me!

name: s VOICE
line: Hello. My name’s Jim Moriarty.

name: s VOICE
line: Welcome ... to the final problem.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s okay. He’s dead.

name: JOHN
line: He doesn’t sound dead.

name: s VOICE
line: This is a recorded announcement.

name: s VOICE
line: Please say hullo to some very old friends of mine.

name: GIRL
line: Hello? I can hear you talking. Please help me! I’m on a plane and it’s going to crash!

name: MYCROFT
line: Is this supposed to be a game?

name: GIRL
line: I’m not supposed to tell my name to strangers.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Of course not. Very good. But, um, I’ll tell you mine. My name is ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: Hello?

name: EURUS
line: Oh dear. We seem to have lost the connection.

name: MYCROFT
line: How have you done this? How is any of this possible?

name: JOHN
line: How can that be Moriarty?

name: EURUS
line: Oh, he recorded lots of little messages for me before he died.

name: EURUS
line: Loved it. Did you know his brother was a station master? I think he was always jealous.

name: SHERLOCK
line: The girl – where is she? Can I talk to her again?

name: EURUS
line: Poor little thing. Alone in the sky in a great big plane with nowhere to land. But where in the world is she? It’s a clever little puzzle. If you want to apply yourself to it, I can reconnect you; but first ...

name: GOVERNOR
line: That’s my wife! (He stares at the screen as Eurus turns her head to look into the camera.) Oh, God, that’s my wife!

name: EURUS
line: I’m going to shoot the governor’s wife.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Please, no. (He gestures vaguely towards Sherlock as if begging him, though he keeps his eyes on the screen.) Please. Help her!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Please don’t do that.

name: EURUS
line: Well, you can stop me.

name: SHERLOCK
line: How?

name: EURUS
line: There’s a gun in the hatch. Take it.

name: EURUS
line: You want to save the governor’s wife? Choose either Doctor Watson or Mycroft to kill the governor.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Oh ... oh God!

name: EURUS
line: You can’t do it, Sherlock. If you do it, it won’t count. I’ll kill her anyway. It has to be your brother or your friend.

name: GOVERNOR
line: You have to do this.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Eurus will kill her.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Doesn’t appear we have a choice.

name: EURUS
line: Countdown starting.

name: MYCROFT
line: How long?

name: EURUS
line: No, no, no. The countdown is for me.

name: EURUS
line: Withholding the precise deadline will apply the emotional pressure more evenly. Where possible, please give me an explicit verbal indication of your anxiety levels.

name: EURUS
line: I can’t always read them from your behaviour.

name: EURUS
line: I’m particularly focussed on internal conflicts, where strategising around a largely intuitive moral code appears to create a counter-intuitive result.

name: MYCROFT
line: I will not kill. I will not have blood on my hands.

name: EURUS
line: Yes, very good. (She turns away from the camera and looks across the office.) Thank you.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Okay, fine.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Doctor Watson. Are you married?

name: GOVERNOR
line: What happened?

name: JOHN
line: She died.

name: GOVERNOR
line: What would you do to save her?

name: GOVERNOR
line: Eurus will kill me. Please save my wife.

name: EURUS
line: There will, I’m afraid, be regular prompts to create an atmosphere of urgency.

name: JIM
line: Tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tock, tick ...

name: JIM
line: Tick-tick-tick-tick-tick-tick-tick-tick-tock, tick-tock ...

name: GOVERNOR
line: David.

name: JOHN
line: And you’re sure about this, David?

name: EURUS
line: Nearly there.

name: JOHN
line: Right. D’you want to ... pray, or anything?

name: GOVERNOR
line: With Eurus Holmes in the world, who the hell would I pray to?

name: JOHN
line: You are a good man, and you are doing a good thing.

name: JOHN
line: I’ll spend the rest of my life telling myself that.

name: GOVERNOR
line: Be quick!

name: EURUS
line: This is very good, Doctor Watson.

name: EURUS
line: I should have fitted you with a cardiograph.

name: JIM
line: Tock-tock-tock-tock-tock-tock-tock tick-tick-tick.

name: JOHN
line: I can’t. (He lowers the gun and turns to Sherlock.) I’m sorry. I can’t do it.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I know. It’s all right.

name: JOHN
line: Stop! No, no, stop.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s all right.

name: GOVERNOR
line: I’m so sorry.

name: SHERLOCK
line: No!

name: JOHN
line: No!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Are you all right?

name: EURUS
line: Interesting.

name: SHERLOCK
line: All right, there you go. You got what you wanted ... (he breathes sharply for a moment) ... and he’s dead.

name: EURUS
line: Dead or alive ... (she spins on her chair to face the screen) ... he really wasn’t very interesting, but you three ... (she leans closer to the camera) ... you three were wonderful. Thank you. (She leans even closer.) You see, what you did, Doctor Watson ...

name: EURUS
line: ... specifically because of your moral code ...

name: EURUS
line: ... because you don’t want blood on your hands, two people are dead instead of one.

name: JOHN
line: Two people?

name: EURUS
line: Yes. Sorry, hang on.

name: JOHN
line: Oh!

name: EURUS
line: What advantage did your moral code grant you?

name: EURUS
line: Is it not, in the end, selfish to keep one’s hands clean at the expense of another’s life?

name: JOHN
line: You didn’t have to kill her!

name: EURUS
line: The condition of her survival was that you or Mycroft had to kill her husband.

name: EURUS
line: This is an experiment. There will be rigour. Sherlock, pick up the gun. It’s your turn next.

name: EURUS
line: When I tell you to use it – and I will – remember what happened this time.

name: EURUS
line: Oh, the gun is intended as a mercy.

name: SHERLOCK
line: For whom?

name: EURUS
line: You.

name: EURUS
line: If someone else had to die, would you really want to do it with your bare hands? It would waste valuable time.

name: JOHN
line: Probably just take it.

name: SHERLOCK
line: There’s only one bullet left.

name: EURUS
line: You will only need one. But you will need it.

name: EURUS
line: Please, go through. There’s a few tasks for you, and a girl on a plane is getting very, very scared.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Treats?

name: MYCROFT
line: Yes. You know, a violin.

name: SHERLOCK
line: In exchange for ...?

name: MYCROFT
line: She’s very clever.

name: s VOICE
line: Come on now! Aaaaaall aboard! (High-pitched) Choo-choo! Choo-choo!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Someone’s been redecorating.

name: JOHN
line: Is that allowed?

name: SHERLOCK
line: She’s literally taken over the asylum. We have more to worry about than her choice of colour scheme.

name: MYCROFT
line: Barely dry. Recent.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s for our benefit.

name: EURUS
line: As a motivator to your continued co-operation, I’m now reconnecting you.

name: s VOICE
line: Are-are you still there?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yes, hello?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Hello. We’re still here. Can you hear us?

name: GIRL
line: Yes.

name: GIRL
line: Night.

name: GIRL
line: Um, I don’t know.

name: JOHN
line: Is it big or small?

name: GIRL
line: Big.

name: JOHN
line: Lots of people on it?

name: GIRL
line: Lots and lots, but they’re all asleep. I can’t wake them up.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Where did you take off from?

name: GIRL
line: Even the driver’s asleep.

name: SHERLOCK
line: No, I understand; but where did you come from? Where did the plane take off?

name: GIRL
line: My nan’s.

name: SHERLOCK
line: And where are you going?

name: GIRL
line: Home.

name: SHERLOCK
line: No, I mean what airport are you ...

name: MYCROFT
line: This is inhuman; this is insane!

name: EURUS
line: Six months ago, a man called Evans was murdered; unsolved except by me.

name: EURUS
line: He was shot from a distance of three hundred metres with this rifle.

name: EURUS
line: Now, if the police had any brains they’d realise there are three suspects, all brothers. Nathan Garrideb, Alex Garrideb and Howard Garrideb.

name: EURUS
line: All these photos are up-to-date, but which one pulled the trigger, Sherlock? Which one?

name: EURUS
line: Please, make use of your friends, Sherlock. I want to see you interact with people that you’re close to. Also, you may have to choose which one to keep.

name: SHERLOCK
line: What do you make of it?

name: MYCROFT
line: Am I being asked to prove my usefulness?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yes, I should think you are.

name: MYCROFT
line: I will not be manipulated like this.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Fine. John?

name: JOHN
line: Yeah, I think I’ve seen one of these. It’s a buffalo gun. (He raises the rifle and aims it towards the floor at the other end of the room, looking into the telescopic sight.) I’d say nineteen forties, old-fashioned sight, no crosshairs.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Glasses, glasses. (He points to the first photograph.) Nathan wears glasses. Evans was shot from three hundred metres.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Kickback from a gun with this calibre ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: No cuts, no scarring. Not Nathan, then. (He turns the photo over.) Who’s next?

name: MYCROFT
line: Do you have a suspicion we’re being made to compete?

name: JOHN
line: ... and that means to hell with what happens to us.

name: MYCROFT
line: Oh, dear God.

name: EURUS
line: Two of the Garridebs work here as orderlies, so getting the third along really wasn’t too difficult.

name: EURUS
line: Once you bring in your verdict, let me know and justice will be done.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Justice?

name: JOHN
line: What will you do with them?

name: EURUS
line: Early release.

name: SHERLOCK
line: You’ll drop them into the sea.

name: EURUS
line: Sink, or swim.

name: EURUS
line: Exactly! Now there is context.

name: EURUS
line: Please, continue with your deductions. I’m now focussing on the difference to your mental capacity a specified consequence can make.

name: MYCROFT
line: What if we’re disinclined to play your games, little sister?

name: EURUS
line: I have – if you remember – provided you with some motivation.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Oh. That’s nice. Try to tell me more about the plane.

name: GIRL
line: Why won’t my mummy wake up?

name: SHERLOCK
line: There’s no way he could have taken that shot from three hundred metres away.

name: SHERLOCK
line: So that leaves us with Alex.

name: MYCROFT
line: He’s shortsighted, or he was. His recent laser surgery has done the trick.

name: MYCROFT
line: Look at his clothes. He’s made an effort.

name: SHERLOCK
line: But he got his eyes fixed. His hands were steady. He pulled the trigger.

name: SHERLOCK
line: He killed Evans.

name: EURUS
line: Are you ready to condemn the prisoner?

name: MYCROFT
line: Sherlock, we can’t do this.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Alex.

name: EURUS
line: Say it. Condemn him.

name: EURUS
line: Condemn him in the knowledge of what will happen to the man you name.

name: EURUS
line: Congratulations.

name: EURUS
line: You got the right one.

name: EURUS
line: Now, go through the door.

name: EURUS
line: Does it really make a difference, killing the innocent instead of the guilty? (She looks down thoughtfully.) Let’s see.

name: JIM
line: The train has left the station!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Don’t let her distract you.

name: EURUS
line: One more minute on the phone.

name: GIRL
line: Frightened. I’m really frightened.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s okay, don’t worry.

name: GIRL
line: Just the sea. I can see the sea.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Are there ships on it?

name: GIRL
line: No ships. I can see lights in the distance.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Is it a city?

name: GIRL
line: I think so.

name: MYCROFT
line: She’s about to fly over a city in a pilotless plane. We’ll have to talk her through it.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Still here. Just give us a minute.

name: JOHN
line: No. W-we could help her land it.

name: MYCROFT
line: And if we fail, and she crashes into a city? How many will die then?

name: JOHN
line: How are we gonna get her to do that?

name: GIRL
line: Everyone’s asleep. Will you help me?

name: SHERLOCK
line: We’re going to do everything that we can.

name: GIRL
line: I’m scared. I’m really scared.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s all right. I ...

name: EURUS
line: Coffin. Problem: someone is about to die. It will be – as I understand it – a tragedy.

name: EURUS
line: Et cetera, et cetera, et cetera, et cetera.

name: EURUS
line: Whose coffin, Sherlock? Please, start your deductions. I will apply some context in a moment.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Well, allowing for the entirely pointless courtesy of headroom, I’d say this coffin is intended for someone of about five foot four. Makes it more likely to be a woman.

name: JOHN
line: Not a child?

name: SHERLOCK
line: A child’s coffin would be more expensive. This is in the lower price range, although still best available in that bracket.

name: SHERLOCK
line: This is a practical and informed choice. Balance of probability suggests that this is for an unmarried woman distant from her close relatives. That much is suggested by the economy of choice.

name: MYCROFT
line: Only it isn’t a name.

name: JOHN
line: So, it’s for somebody who loves somebody.

name: MYCROFT
line: It’s for somebody who loves Sherlock. (Looking towards his brother) This is all about you. Everything here.

name: MYCROFT
line: So who loves you? I’m assuming it’s not a long list.

name: JOHN
line: Irene Adler.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Don’t be ridiculous. Look at the coffin. Unmarried, practical about death, alone.

name: JOHN
line: Molly.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Molly Hooper.

name: EURUS
line: She’s perfectly safe, for the moment.

name: EURUS
line: ... unless I hear the release code from her lips. I’m calling her on your phone, Sherlock. Make her say it.

name: JOHN
line: Say what?

name: EURUS
line: Obvious, surely?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yes.

name: one important restriction
line: you’re not allowed to mention in any way at all that her life is in danger.

name: EURUS
line: You may not – at any point – suggest that there is any form of crisis. If you do, I will end this session and her life. Are we clear?

name: SHERLOCK
line: What’s she doing?

name: MYCROFT
line: She’s making tea.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yes, but why isn’t she answering her phone?

name: s VOICE
line: Leave a message.

name: SHERLOCK
line: No, it’s not a game. I ... need you to help me.

name: MOLLY
line: Look, I’m not at the lab.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s not about that.

name: JIM
line: Tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tick.

name: MOLLY
line: Leave me alone.

name: EURUS
line: Calmly, Sherlock, or I will finish her right now.

name: MOLLY
line: Why are you doing this to me? Why are you making fun of me?

name: EURUS
line: Softer, Sherlock!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Molly, this is for a case. It’s ... it’s a sort of experiment.

name: MOLLY
line: I’m not an experiment, Sherlock.

name: SHERLOCK
line: No, I know you’re not an experiment. You’re my friend. We’re friends. But ... please. Just ... say those words for me.

name: MOLLY
line: I can’t say that. I can’t ... I can’t say that to you.

name: MOLLY
line: You know why.

name: MOLLY
line: Of course you do.

name: JIM
line: Tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tick-tick-tick ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: Please, just say it. (He blinks rapidly.)

name: SHERLOCK
line: Why?

name: MOLLY
line: Because ... it’s ... (she takes a breath and starts to cry) ... true, Sherlock.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Well, if it’s true, just say it anyway.

name: MOLLY
line: You bastard.

name: MOLLY
line: You say it. Go on. You say it first.

name: SHERLOCK
line: What?

name: EURUS
line: Final thirty seconds.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I love you.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Molly?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Molly, please.

name: MOLLY
line: I love you.

name: MYCROFT
line: Sherlock, however hard that was ...

name: The girl on the plane
line: I need to talk to her.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I won. I saved Molly Hooper.

name: EURUS
line: Saved her? From what? Oh, do be sensible. There were no explosives in her little house. Why would I be so clumsy? You didn’t win. You lost.

name: EURUS
line: Look what you did to her. Look what you did to yourself.

name: EURUS
line: All those complicated little emotions. I lost count. Emotional context, Sherlock. It destroys you every time.

name: EURUS
line: Now, please, pull yourself together. I need you at peak efficiency. The next one isn’t going to be so easy.

name: EURUS
line: In your own time.

name: JOHN
line: Sherlock?

name: SHERLOCK
line: No. No.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Soldiers?

name: JIM
line: Tick-tock, tickets please!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Hey, sis, don’t mean to complain but this one’s empty. What happened? Did you run out of ideas?

name: EURUS
line: It’s not empty, Sherlock. You’ve still got the gun, haven’t you? I told you you’d need it, because only two can play the next game. Just two of you go on from here; your choice. (She smiles brightly into the camera.) It’s make-your-mind-up time. Whose help do you need the most – John or Mycroft?

name: EURUS
line: It’s an elimination round. You choose one and kill the other. You have to choose family or friend. Mycroft or John Watson?

name: JIM
line: Tick-tick-tick-tick-tick-tick-tick.

name: MYCROFT
line: Eurus, enough!

name: MYCROFT
line: Well?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Well, what?

name: MYCROFT
line: We’re not actually going to discuss this, are we?

name: MYCROFT
line: I’m sorry, Doctor Watson. You’re a fine man in many respects.

name: MYCROFT
line: Make your goodbyes and shoot him.

name: MYCROFT
line: Shoot him!

name: MYCROFT
line: Shoot Doctor Watson. There’s no question who has to continue from here. It’s us; you and me. Whatever lies ahead requires brainpower, Sherlock, not sentiment. Don’t prolong his agony; shoot him.

name: JOHN
line: Do I get a say in this?

name: MYCROFT
line: I regret, Doctor Watson, that privilege is now yours.

name: JOHN
line: Shit.

name: JOHN
line: He’s right.

name: JOHN
line: He is, in fact, right.

name: MYCROFT
line: God! (He puts his hands in his trouser pockets, grinning.) I should have expected this. (His smile drops.) Pathetic. You always were the slow one ...

name: MYCROFT
line: ... the idiot. That’s why I’ve always despised you. You shame us all. You shame the family name. Now, for once in your life, do the right thing. (He tilts his head towards John.) Put this stupid little man out of all our misery.

name: MYCROFT
line: Shoot him.

name: MYCROFT
line: Look at him. What is he?

name: MYCROFT
line: Nothing more than a distraction; a little scrap of ordinariness for you to impress, to dazzle with your cleverness. You’ll find another.

name: MYCROFT
line: Why?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Which is why this is going to be so much harder.

name: MYCROFT
line: You said you liked my Lady Bracknell.

name: MYCROFT
line: Not in the face, though, please. I’ve promised my brain to the Royal Society.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Where would you suggest?

name: MYCROFT
line: Well ... (he starts doing up the top button of his shirt) ... I suppose there is a heart somewhere inside me. (He looks down and straightens his tie.) I don’t imagine it’s much of a target but ...

name: MYCROFT
line: This is my fault.

name: MYCROFT
line: Moriarty.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Moriarty?

name: MYCROFT
line: Her Christmas treat: five minutes’ conversation with Jim Moriarty five years ago.

name: SHERLOCK
line: What did they discuss?

name: MYCROFT
line: Five minutes’ conversation ...

name: MYCROFT
line: ... unsupervised.

name: MYCROFT
line: Goodbye, brother mine. No flowers ... (he puts his hands behind his back) ... by request.

name: EURUS
line: Jim Moriarty thought you’d make this choice. He was so excited.

name: JIM
line: And here we are, at the end of the line. Holmes killing Holmes.

name: JIM
line: This is where I get off.

name: EURUS
line: What are you doing?

name: SHERLOCK
line: I’m remembering the governor.

name: EURUS
line: No, no, Sherlock.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Nine ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: Eight ...

name: EURUS
line: You can’t!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Seven ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: Six ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: Five ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: Four ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: How-how-how long was I away?

name: GIRL
line: Hours. Hours and hours. Why don’t grown-ups tell the truth?

name: GIRL
line: Where did you go?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Um, now, I tell you what. You-you’ve got to be really, really brave for me.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Can you go to the front of the plane? Can you do that?

name: GIRL
line: The front?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yes.

name: SHERLOCK
line: That’s right; the front.

name: GIRL
line: You mean where the driver is?

name: GIRL
line: Okay. (She starts to get up from the floor.) I’m going.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Are you there yet?

name: JOHN
line: Yeah, I’m here.

name: SHERLOCK
line: John!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Where are you?

name: JOHN
line: I don’t know. I’ve just woken up. Where are you?

name: SHERLOCK
line: I’m in another cell. I just spoke to the girl on the plane again. We’ve been out for hours.

name: JOHN
line: What, she’s still up there?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yes. (His voice comes over John’s earpiece.) The plane will keep flying until it runs out of fuel.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Is Mycroft with you?

name: JOHN
line: I have no idea. I can hardly see anything. (He calls out.) Mycroft? Mycroft?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Are you okay?

name: JOHN
line: Yeah.

name: SHERLOCK
line: All right. Well, just keep exploring. Tell me anything you can about where you are.

name: JOHN
line: The walls are ... (he puts a hand on the wall and feels it) ... rough. They’re rock, I guess.

name: SHERLOCK
line: What are you standing on?

name: But listen
line: there’s about two feet of water.

name: JOHN
line: Chains. (He shakes his head.) Yeah, my feet are chained up. I can feel something.

name: JOHN
line: Bones, Sherlock.

name: JOHN
line: There are bones in here.

name: SHERLOCK
line: What kind of bones?

name: JOHN
line: Uh, I dunno. S-small.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Oh, hello. Are you at the front of the plane now?

name: SHERLOCK
line: All right. Well, you and I are going to have to drive this plane together. (He slowly stands, looking up towards the sky.) Just you and me.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Now, um, can you see anything that looks like a radio?

name: GIRL
line: No.

name: SHERLOCK
line: That’s all right. Well, we ... keep looking. We’ve got plenty of time.

name: SHERLOCK
line: What’s wrong?

name: GIRL
line: The whole plane’s shaking.

name: SHERLOCK
line: It’s just turbulence. It’s nothing to worry about.

name: GIRL
line: My ears hurt.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Does the river look like it’s getting closer?

name: GIRL
line: A-a little bit.

name: SHERLOCK
line: All right, then. That means you’re nearly home.

name: JOHN
line: I’m in a well. That’s where I am; I’m in the bottom of a well.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Why would there be a well in Sherrinford?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Why is there a draught?

name: SHERLOCK
line: Walls don’t contract after you’ve painted them.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I’m home. Musgrave Hall.

name: EURUS
line: ... which reminded me of home.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yeah, still not interested. The plane!

name: EURUS
line: You knew he’d take his revenge. His revenge apparently is me.

name: EURUS
line: I’m letting the water in now. You don’t want me to drown another one of your pets, do you? At long last, Sherlock Holmes, it’s time to solve the Musgrave ritual.

name: EURUS
line: Your very first case! And the final problem. (Her voice drops to a whisper.) Oh. Bye-bye.

name: JOHN
line: Sherlock?

name: VOICE
line: ♪ I that am lost / Oh, who will find me / Deep down below ...

name: JOHN
line: Sherlock!

name: VOICE
line: ♪ The old beech tree?

name: VOICE
line: ♪ Help succour me now ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: John.

name: VOICE
line: ♪ The East winds blow ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: John. (Shouting) John? Can you hear me? John!

name: VOICE
line: ♪ Sixteen by six, brother, and under we go ...

name: GIRL
line: Help me! Help me, please!

name: VOICE
line: ♪ Be not afraid ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: John.

name: GIRL
line: It’s leaning over, the whole plane!

name: SHERLOCK
line: Eurus, you said the answer’s in the song ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: ... but I went through the song line by line all those years ago ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: ... and I found nothing. I couldn’t find anything. And there-there was a beech tree in the grounds and I dug.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I dug and dug and dug and dug. Sixteen feet by six; sixteen yards; sixteen metres – and I found nothing. No-one.

name: EURUS
line: Emotional context. And he-e-e-e-re it comes.

name: JOHN
line: Sherlock? (He’s standing up in the water staring in anguish at something we can’t yet see.) The bones I found.

name: JOHN
line: Mycroft’s been lying to you; to both of us.

name: JOHN
line: They’re not dogs’ bones.

name: EURUS
line: Remember Daddy’s allergy? What was he allergic to?

name: EURUS
line: What would he never let you have all those times you begged? Well, he’d never let you have a dog.

name: SHERLOCK
line: We played pirates. I was Yellowbeard and he was ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: ... he was Redbeard.

name: EURUS
line: You were inseparable. But I wanted to play too.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Oh. Oh God.

name: SHERLOCK
line: What ... (he pulls in several breaths before he can continue) ... what did you do?

name: VICTOR
line: Please let me out! Please, someone help me! Please.

name: SHERLOCK
line: You killed my best friend.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Need your help. I’m trying to solve a puzzle.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Well, the puzzle will save the plane.

name: SHERLOCK
line: The wrong dates. She used the wrong dates on the gravestones as the key to the cipher ... (he runs to shine the lantern on Nemo Holmes’ gravestone) ... and the cipher was the song.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Yes, it is. I’ll be with you in a minute.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Let’s number the words of the song.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Then rearrange the numbered words to match the sequence on the gravestones.

name: s note
line: for this to work, we have to assume that the second large verse is actually the fourth verse of the song.])

name: SHERLOCK
line: I ... am ... lost ... Help ... me ... brother ... Save ... My ... Life ... Before ... my ... Doom.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I ... am ... Lost ... Without ... your ... love ... Save ... My ... soul ... seek ... my ... room.

name: GIRL
line: We’re going to crash! I’m going to die!

name: SHERLOCK
line: I think it’s time you told me your real name.

name: SHERLOCK
line: I’m your brother.

name: EURUS
line: You’re playing with me, Sherlock. We’re playing the game.

name: SHERLOCK
line: The game, yes. I get it now. (He steps closer to her.) The song was never a set of directions.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Look how brilliant you are. Your mind has created the perfect metaphor. You’re high above us, all alone in the sky, and you understand everything except how to land. (He shifts round and sits down in front of her, breathless and anxious.) Now, I’m just an idiot, but I’m on the ground. (He reaches out and puts his fingers onto her hands.) I can bring you home.

name: EURUS
line: No, no. (She shivers.) It’s too late now.

name: EURUS
line: Every time I close my eyes, I’m on the plane. I’m lost, lost in the sky and ... no-one can hear me.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Eurus ...

name: SHERLOCK
line: Help me save John Watson.

name: LESTRADE
line: I just spoke to your brother.

name: LESTRADE
line: He’s a bit shaken up, that’s all. She didn’t hurt him; she just locked him in her old cell.

name: JOHN
line: What goes around comes around.

name: LESTRADE
line: Yeah. Give me a moment, boys.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Oh, um. Mycroft – make sure he’s looked after. He’s not as strong as he thinks he is.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Thanks, Greg.

name: POLICE OFFICER
line: Mm-hm.

name: LESTRADE
line: Let’s move her, then.

name: POLICE OFFICER
line: Is that him, sir? Sherlock Holmes?

name: LESTRADE
line: Fan, are you?

name: POLICE OFFICER
line: Well, he’s a great man, sir.

name: LESTRADE
line: No, he’s better than that. (He looks towards Sherlock for a moment.) He’s a good one.

name: JOHN
line: Well, you gave her what she was looking for: context.

name: JOHN
line: It’s not good, it’s not bad. It’s ...

name: JOHN
line: It is what it is.

name: MYCROFT
line: What Uncle Rudy began ... (he hesitates slightly, his eyes lowered) ... I thought it best to continue.

name: MYCROFT
line: I was trying to be kind.

name: MRS HOLMES
line: Kind?! (She gasps in a pained breath.) Kind? (She becomes tearful as she continues.) You told us that our daughter was dead.

name: MYCROFT
line: Better that than tell you what she had become.

name: MYCROFT
line: I’m sorry.

name: MR HOLMES
line: Whatever she became, whatever she is now, Mycroft ...

name: MYCROFT
line: And my sister.

name: MRS HOLMES
line: Then you should have done better.

name: MRS HUDSON
line: Then he’s very limited.

name: MR HOLMES
line: Where is she?

name: MYCROFT
line: Back in Sherrinford; secure, this time. (He looks at his father.) People have died.

name: MR HOLMES
line: When can we see her?

name: MYCROFT
line: She has passed beyond our view.

name: MRS HOLMES
line: Well?

name: JOHN
line: Uh, yeah, I-I think you’d better get round here.

name: MARY
line: P.S.

name: you listen to me
line: who you really are, it doesn’t matter.

name: SHERLOCK
line: Oh, there’s Daddy!

name: MARY
line: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson.
